Portfolio

About

I’m a software engineer. I was previously working in logistics and in the past year I’ve fell in love with Javascript and picked up multiple technologies such as react, angular and node. I’ve recently built and deployed a few applications. An application that I'm proud of is a healthcare application that employes a text reminder for user prescriptions and a specialist recommendation engine that uses a machine learning library. For that project we used React, Mongo, Express, Node, and a few third party APIs. I’m very passionate about javascript frameworks such as React and currently in the process of learning Redux and Flux. I’m really interested in working for a health care startup or a company that has humanitarian mission.

I'm a huge Basketball fan and love to talk sports. I'm also constantly keeping up with the news and what's going on in the world. I also love to travel and explore various cuisines.

Around the Web

Copyright © Dr. Henry Jekyll 2016

Project 1

OneCare is a unified health care application. Text reminders for refills and daily prescription dosage. Google maps API for nearest pharmacies. Machine Learning algorithm for specialist recommendations based off user inputted symptoms.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Web Development

Project 2

Group based task manager that is geared towards families. You can create groups, add and delete members and assign tasks to either the group or specific members in the group.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Web Development

Project 3

Generate a random quote from an assortment of categories.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Web Development
